Text: Hulunbuir:  Its administrative center is located at Hailar District, its largest urban area.

Text: Hulunbuir:  Hulun Buir borders Russia to the north and west, Mongolia to the south and west, Heilongjiang province to the east and Hinggan League to the direct south.
Triplets:<Hulunbuir
4:
--------------------
<Text: Hulunbuir:  Hulunbuir is a linguistically diverse area: next to Mandarin Chinese, Mongolian dialects such as Khorchin and Buryat, the Mongolic language Dagur and some Tungusic languages are spoken there.>
